rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {2984, 2985, 2986, 3462}
Must have passed 5 (I/W) units in {PGW1101, PGW1102, PGW1103, PGW1104, PGW1105, PGW5101, PGW5102, PGW5103, PGW5104, PGW5105, VCW1101, VCW1102, VCW1103, VCW1104, VCW1105}

unitName: Practical wound care training and assessment
description: This is a one week core unit conducted on-campus. This program includes clinical observation in Melbourne metropolitan wound clinics and a series of workshops on specific practical wound skills such as, measuring ABI using Doppler, debridement of wounds, compression bandaging, assessment of complex clients and dressing product selection. Please note that places in this unit are limited.
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
